Standoff 2 is two years old!
For that reason we launch temporary event “2 Years Celebration”!
Take part in 3 special game modes that will definitely give you maximum fun!
Earn special points and exchange them for exclusive skins!

Classic is back!
In honor of the celebration one of the most favorite maps in Standoff Multiplayer is presented in a new form. Yes, this is Arena!
New map is available in «Deathmatch», «Arms Race» and «2 Years Celebration»!

Mechanics of the jump was improved - now you can change the trajectory of movement while jumping.
Fixed the bug with the lack of defuse sound when a defusing player was not in field of view of a camera.
Now sounds in the game have priority.
The more important a sound is, the better it being heard.
Priorities of footsteps were changed: opponent's footsteps are being heard better now.
Changed the sounds of AKR, AK12, P350.

All this is waiting for you! Check it out and have fun!

The “New Year Madness” in Standoff 2 starts today and lasts for 28 days! 
Play 3 new temporary modes: show your skill defending the position in King of the Hill, 
cover your enemies with snow in Snow Madness, or become crazy Santa in Santa mode. 
Complete special missions, upgrade your Battle Pass level and get skins, stickers, medals and knives from «New Year 2020» collection. Go through the Battle Pass again to achieve even more! 
Happy New Year!

Presenting the new update, code-named Project Z9!
What's in:
- The start of Season 1 — the first ever Standoff 2 game season
- A battle pass with unique missions
- The special Interception game mode
- Zone 9 map has returned in updated form
- Big changes to the Province map
- A new algorithm for the way Competitive mode works
- Two new weapons: the MP5 submachine gun and the FabM pump shotgun
- Two new knives: the Scorpion and Kunai
- Three new characters for the attacking team on the Province map
- Three new characters for the attacking team on the Zone 9 map
- Two new collections and two new sticker packs
- Localization files updated and fixed

Season 2 has started!
Join a clan war together with your team! Take part in clan vs. clan battles based on competitive rules.
Explore the autumnal Rust map!
Leaves under your feet, ominous fallen trees, and ravens cawing eerily in the distance.
Check out the special Training mode!
It's important to warm up before going on a mission.
Take part in new battle pass missions! New packs of stickers and skins are now in the game.
Don't forget to claim your reward for taking part in the previous season!

We have introduced a number of changes to make playing Standoff 2 even more enjoyable.
They include the following:
• If a cheater is discovered in a competitive match, the results of the match will be canceled and will not affect ranks and stats
• The music volume in the game has been fixed
• Issues with logging in via Facebook
• The Zone 9 map has undergone some minor visual alterations
